feature_name: Autopilot build stamping, local stats panel, and deploy wrapper
scope_summary: Stabilize the Autopilot deployment workflow by stamping builds with source commit hash, adding a one-command website deploy wrapper, and shipping a local-only stats panel (actions, persona selections, snoozes) in Hub Beta.

legal_and_regulatory.rationale: Changes are internal deploy metadata and local product telemetry only, with no regulated claim or legal policy scope change.
evidence: No new account, payment, or consent workflow introduced

privacy_local_first_promise.rationale: Stats remain local-only and are persisted in the same local IndexedDB/localStorage layer as the app data.
evidence: No analytics endpoint or network event emission added

medical_scope_and_claims.rationale: No medical framing or claims were added or modified.

behavioral_science_alignment.rationale: Stats give immediate self-feedback on behavior use without adding pressure mechanics or dark pattern loops.
evidence: Stats panel is informational and local only
No streaks, penalties, or coercive prompts introduced

neurodivergence_research_alignment.rationale: Local-only usage reflection supports low-friction self-observation while preserving privacy expectations.
evidence: Persona selection count and action count are visible in one compact panel

user_benefit_and_harm_check.rationale: Users gain traceable build identity and transparent local behavior counters, reducing uncertainty around what version is deployed and whether behavior layer is used.
evidence: Build stamp shows source commit in UI
Deploy wrapper script reduces manual deployment command errors

brand_voice_and_claims.rationale: Language remains plain and pragmatic; trust copy clarifies limitations without overpromising capabilities.
evidence: App displays explicit reminder limitation line
Stats labels are straightforward and non-hyped

accessibility_and_inclusion.rationale: Stats are rendered as readable text and chips in existing responsive layouts without introducing hidden interactions.
evidence: Stats panel uses text + button-free readout elements
Existing mobile-responsive CSS kept and extended

security_and_reliability.rationale: Build stamping improves provenance while the wrapper script standardizes source path invocation and reduces deploy variance.
evidence: build_app_into_site.sh exports VITE_BUILD_STAMP from APP_SOURCE commit

monetization_and_dark_pattern_check.rationale: No monetization or conversion flow changes are included.

ship_decision.conditions: Ship and confirm live /hub/beta shows stats panel and build stamp hash for the deployed source commit.
